mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tenant (tenant_name, age, married, identify, gender, phone, mobile, sec_mobile, email, qq, wechat, hobby, job, buy_intention, pic_url, doc_url, comments) VALUES (#{tenant_name}, #{age}, #{married}, #{identify}, #{gender}, #{phone}, #{mobile}, #{sec_mobile}, #{email}, #{qq}, #{wechat}, #{hobby}, #{job}, #{buy_intention}, #{pic_url}, #{doc_url}, #{comments})
